text: Got the baked ziti and the spaghetti. The ziti was definitely not baked, it was just regular ziti pasta with red sauce. The service was quick, and the pasta was warm. But the taste was just okay, definitely tasted like fast food pasta. Much too overcooked, and a bit wet.
